entry.title: WIND WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 4:17 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: ENE 16 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
